core-basic.description: Basic examples of Core Usage (e.g. rendering, image loading)

tutorial.name: Tutorial
tutorial.description: This example shows the result of the basic rendering tutorial.

stackBasic.name: Basic Stack Viewport Usage
stackBasic.description: Displays a single image in a Stack Viewport.

stackAPI.name: Stack Viewport API
stackAPI.description: Demonstrates how to interact with a Stack viewport (e.g. Set VOI Range, Next/Previous Images, Flip H/V, Rotate, Invert, Zoom/Pan, Reset)

stackEvents.name: Stack Viewport Events
stackEvents.description: Demonstrates the Events that are fired during interaction with a Stack Viewport

stackCanvasToWorld.name: Stack Viewport Canvas-to-World
stackCanvasToWorld.description: Demonstrates how to obtain the coordinates in the 3D world from a coordinate on the canvas.

volumeBasic.name: Basic Volume Viewport Usage
volumeBasic.description: Displays a set of DICOM images in a Volume Viewport.

volumeAPI.name: Volume Viewport API
volumeAPI.description: Demonstrates how to interact with a Volume viewport  (e.g. Set VOI Range, Change Camera Position / Orientation, Change Slab Thickness, Flip H/V, Rotate, Invert, Zoom/Pan, Reset)

volumeEvents.name: Volume Viewport Events
volumeEvents.description: Demonstrates the Events that are fired during interaction with a Volume Viewport

multiVolumeAPI.name: Multiple Volumes in a Volume Viewport
multiVolumeAPI.description: Demonstrates how to interact with a Volume viewport when using multiple volumes (e.g. for PET/CT fusion).

multiVolumeCanvasToWorld.name: Multiple Volume Canvas-to-World
multiVolumeCanvasToWorld.description: Demonstrates how to use the canvasToWorld API to find the intensity value of each volume on mouse hover
